Summary: 2 sphered lights hovering and then disapperared
trends: There has been one other sighting in Brownstown Charter Township
There were no other sightings in Brownstown Charter Township on or around April 18th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home at night with nobody else on the road. We saw 2 bright white lighted shaped sphere objects that were hovering over us. They started moving together and then one just took off and disappeared. The other one started moving farther away and it looked like it changed color to a faded yellow color then it took off and disappeared in thin air also.
